game.name: Woute
game.shortDescription: We play for small shaman in the world of dreams, which moves in a static world to move to the next level
game.shortDescriptionEn: We play for small shaman in the world of dreams, which moves in a static world to move to the next level

reviewHighlights.text: Genuinely a very cute & nice mechanic but it's literally beaten in 5 minutes.
A fun and unusual game, I like it.
